definition: native place/place of origin/home state or region

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 傢伙|家伙[jia1 huo5]
to go back to one's roots/to return to one's native place/by ext. to join one's ancestors (i.e. to die)
variant of 老家伙[lao3 jia1 huo5]
(coll.) old fellow/old codger
variant of 老家伙[lao3 jia1 huo5]
(coll.) old fellow/old codger
(dialect) sparrow

sentences.english: They were pining for their homeland back in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 他们日思夜想要回到欧洲老家。

sentences.english: Surrounded by guardsoul the little guy can perish the old guy thoroughly.
sentences.chinese: 被守护魄环绕着的小家伙能彻底毁灭老家伙。

sentences.english: The beautiful sky was the home of his heart.
sentences.chinese: 这美丽的天空是它心目中的老家。

sentences.english: Does it bother you if I stir it with my fingers, old-timer?
sentences.chinese: 介意我用指头搅拌一下吗，老家伙？

sentences.english: Who's the old scag sitting next to him?
sentences.chinese: 坐他旁边的老家伙是谁？

sentences.english: This part of the backgammon board is the home.
sentences.chinese: 此部分西洋双陆棋盘是老家。

sentences.english: XiaoMin cannot go back to the home for my parents with small-business hua.
sentences.chinese: 小敏无法回到了老家华欣帮父母打理小本生意。

sentences.english: He was happy and comfortable back in his old home.
sentences.chinese: 他回到老家感到愉快舒适。

sentences.english: That old boy is going to explode soon.
sentences.chinese: 老家伙马上就要气炸了。

sentences.english: Are these wise, old heads being overlooked?
sentences.chinese: 这些精明的老家伙们被忽视了么？

sentences.english: He dreams of the teaching job at Kabul University and of marrying a woman back home. She is the daughter of family friends a Sayed Shiite who traces her lineage to the prophet Muhammad.
sentences.chinese: 他梦想着在喀布尔大学任教，然后回老家娶媳妇。

sentences.english: The first old man stepped up to the tee and hit.
sentences.chinese: 第一个老家伙走到发球区，打了一杆。

sentences.english: On the day we left our old home town, we had a going away lunch with our friends from church.
sentences.chinese: 离开老家的那天，我们和教友一起吃了饯行午餐。

sentences.english: Huang Dongmei has left home for work since her paid back the money and there are only her grandparents at home.
sentences.chinese: 目前，老家就只有黄冬梅的爷爷奶奶在。

sentences.english: In my old home we used to sit outside all night with the fire.
sentences.chinese: 我们在自己老家的时候，可以围着篝火一夜坐到天亮。

sentences.english: George eis a funny old bugger.
sentences.chinese: 乔治是个有趣的老家伙。

definition: to go back to one's roots/to return to one's native place/by ext. to join one's ancestors (i.e. to die)
countryside/rural area/CL:個|个[ge4]
hometown/native place/CL:個|个[ge4]
married woman's parents' home
home
to celebrate the Chinese New Year
parts of the country other than where one is
to return home
a relative (i.e. family relation)/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
rural area/village/CL:個|个[ge4]
fellow townsman/fellow villager/sb from the same hometown
to work a temporary or casual job/(of students) to have a job outside of class time, or during vacation
county seat/county town
wife's mother, mother-in-law
(of a wife) to return to her parental home/(fig.) to return to one's old place, job, school etc
to return/to go back
